item.title: Is there a way to remove skill xp from a command?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zipskills") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(-500000000, 0); addSkillXP(-500000000, 1); addSkillXP(-500000000, 2); addSkillXP(-500000000, 3); addSkillXP(-500000000, 4); addSkillXP(-500000000, 5); addSkillXP(-500000000, 6); addSkillXP(-500000000, 7); addSkillXP(-500000000, 8); addSkillXP(-500000000, 9); addSkillXP(-500000000, 10); addSkillXP(-500000000, 11); addSkillXP(-500000000, 12); addSkillXP(-500000000, 13); addSkillXP(-500000000, 14); addSkillXP(-500000000, 15); addSkillXP(-500000000, 16); addSkillXP(-500000000, 17); addSkillXP(-500000000, 18); addSkillXP(-500000000, 19); addSkillXP(-500000000, 20); sendMessage("bye bye skills"); }

Look at this… It adds Minus experience. See the minus sign? it will delete experience… Try it, it will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to remove skill xp from a command?

item.title: Is there a way to remove skill xp from a command?
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Where not tryna add skill exp uber where tryna delete it look here

public void crystalkey()
{
		sendMessage("You have opened the crystal chest!");
		deleteItem(989,getItemSlot(989),1);
		addItem(1615,1);
		addItem(Item2.randomCrystal(), 1);
}

This line below it the line to delete the crystal key and add spare invent spot plus item 1615 into its spot. Item 1615 i think is dragonstone haven’t tested my crystal chest yet. But ye thats an item that you always get.

deleteItem(989,getItemSlot(989),1);

This line below chooses another random item from item2.java and places it in your invent spot

addItem(Item2.randomCrystal(), 1);

Should be similiar to that. Try doing delete.
So it should be probably like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zipskills") && playerRights >= 2)
	{
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 0);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 1);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 2);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 3);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 4);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 5);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 6);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 7);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 8);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 9);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 10);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 11);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 12);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 13);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 14);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 15);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 16);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 17);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 18);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 19);
	deleteSkillXP(500000000, 20);
	sendMessage("bye bye skills");
}

I hope that works otherwise ill try something else.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 03, 2006, 09:29:19 PM[/size][hr]Uber addskillexp adds it where tryna remove,delete,exterminate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way to remove skill xp from a command?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zipskills") && playerRights >= 2) { deleteSkillXP(500000000, 0); subtractSkillXP(500000000, 1); removeSkillXP(500000000, 2); removeSkillXP(500000000, 3); removeSkillXP(500000000, 4); removeSkillXP(500000000, 5); removeSkillXP(500000000, 6); removeSkillXP(500000000, 7); removeSkillXP(500000000, 8); removeSkillXP(500000000, 9); removeSkillXP(500000000, 10); removeSkillXP(500000000, 11); removeSkillXP(500000000, 12); removeSkillXP(500000000, 13); removeSkillXP(500000000, 14); removeSkillXP(500000000, 15); removeSkillXP(500000000, 16); removeSkillXP(500000000, 17); removeSkillXP(500000000, 18); removeSkillXP(500000000, 19); removeSkillXP(500000000, 20); sendMessage("bye bye skills"); }
Should be

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zipskills") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(-500000000, 0); addSkillXP(-500000000, 1); addSkillXP(-500000000, 2); addSkillXP(-500000000, 3); addSkillXP(-500000000, 4); addSkillXP(-500000000, 5); addSkillXP(-500000000, 6); addSkillXP(-500000000, 7); addSkillXP(-500000000, 8); addSkillXP(-500000000, 9); addSkillXP(-500000000, 10); addSkillXP(-500000000, 11); addSkillXP(-500000000, 12); addSkillXP(-500000000, 13); addSkillXP(-500000000, 14); addSkillXP(-500000000, 15); addSkillXP(-500000000, 16); addSkillXP(-500000000, 17); addSkillXP(-500000000, 18); addSkillXP(-500000000, 19); addSkillXP(-500000000, 20); sendMessage("bye bye skills"); }

item.title: Is there a way to remove skill xp from a command?
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Hmm does the work?
removeSkillXP(########, ##);

It should work otherwise you’ll have to find something that can hmm delete something. Like when u crystal key on the chest you get something back and it deletes the key from your invent. And when you remove you xp you get a certain item. Similiar thing but works with skills instead, I might look into that.

Thanks for the idea i’ll try get some stuff for you.
